comments.body:
This package should provide `libGL.so`:
```bash
$ find /opt/conda/pkgs -name libGL.so
/opt/conda/pkgs/mesa-libgl-devel-cos6-x86_64-11.0.7-h5a2c0ac_0/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib64/libGL.so
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@    # Required for OpenGL support
    # See https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html?highlight=cdt#libgl
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}  # [linux]

comments.body: Actually, this is MIT, I just need to fix the one above instead.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@  home: https://github.com/frankheckenbach/ftgl
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: 'Use Freetype2 to simplify rendering fonts in OpenGL applications'
